thread.title: ‘Clear evidence’ Putin has interfered with British election results, claims former Europe Minister
thread.title_full: ‘Clear evidence’ Putin has interfered with British election results, claims former Europe Minister

author: bvonow
title: ‘Clear evidence’ Putin has interfered with British election results, claims former Europe Minister
text:
Comments THERE is “clear evidence” of direct Russian involvement in British elections, a Labour former minister has said. 
Former Europe minister Chris Bryant also warned that many believed some of the highest level security decisions affecting the UK had now been compromised by Russian interference. PA:Press Association 2 Former Europe Minister Labour Chris Bryant claimed that some of Britain’s elections had been tampered with 
Fellow Labour former minister Ben Bradshaw has previously claimed it was “highly probable” Russia interfered in the EU referendum through cyber warfare, a claim the Government says there is no evidence for. 
Mr Bryant repeated these concerns as MPs considered new powers to tackle money laundering, which many have seen as a crackdown on corrupt money flowing into the UK from Russia and other countries. 
He said: “There is now clear evidence of Russian direct, corrupt involvement in elections in France, in Germany, in the United States of America, and I would argue also in this country. 
“Many believe that some of the highest level decisions affecting security in the United Kingdom, in Germany, in France and in the United States of America are now compromised by Russian infiltration.” RELATED STORIES PUTIN ON A BRAVE FACE 'American spies' in the heart of the Kremlin leaked details of Russia's hacking of the US election LEAKER EXPOSED Who is Edward Majerczyk and which celebrities had their iCloud and Gmail accounts hacked? ‘SLEAZEBAGS’ Furious Donald Trump slams political rivals over ‘fake news’ dirty dossier VLAD’S ENOUGH! Russia’s UK Embassy tweets far-right meme at Theresa May as Moscow says it's 'tired' of hacking probes ONE STEP AHEAD Brit spies ‘alerted CIA’ to US presidential race hacking after stopping Russian attack on 2015 election 
Mr Bryant made the comments while speaking in the Commons during a debate on the government’s criminal finance bill looking into corruption.
